      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="en">Sanitation notices for the preparation of food</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hygienebegriffe für die Vorbereitung der Nahrung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Notifications d'hygiène pour la préparation de 
la nourriture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Observações do sanitation para a preparação do
alimento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Avvisi di risanamento per la preparazione di 
alimento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ειδοποιήσεις υγιεινής για την προετοιμασία των 
τροφίμων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Avisos del saneamiento para la preparación del 
alimento</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows two notices that might be found in the kitchen where health and sanitation are essential factors in the preparation of food.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Cooking</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">diseases</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">food</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Health</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Microbes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sanitation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">washing</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt zwei Begriffe, die in der 
Küche gefunden werden konnten, in der Gesundheit und Hygiene 
wesentliche Faktoren in der Vorbereitung der Nahrung sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre deux notices qui 
pourraient être trouvées dans la cuisine où la santé et l'hygiène
est des facteurs essentiels dans la préparation de la nourriture.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra duas observações que 
puderam ser encontradas na cozinha onde a saúde e o sanitation são 
fatores essenciais na preparação do alimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra due avvisi che 
potrebbero essere trovati nella cucina in cui la salute ed il 
risanamento sono fattori essenziali nella preparazione di alimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει δύο ειδοποιήσεις που να 
βρεθούν στην κουζίνα όπου η υγεία και η υγιεινή είναι 
ουσιαστικοί παράγοντες κατά την προετοιμασία των τροφίμων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra dos avisos que se 
pudieron encontrar en la cocina donde están factores la salud y el 
saneamiento esenciales en la preparación del alimento.</string>
          </description>
